name: BMI Calculator
description: One of my first projects, check your body mass index here. Written in javaScript.

name: FizzBuzz
description: A simple application utilizing a function to return an output. Written in javaScript, unit and feature tests with e2e training wheel testing package.

name: Address Book
description: Browser based address book to store contacts. Written in javaScript, feature tests Cucumber.

name: Rock Paper Scissors in React
description: Using React to build a simple game of Rock Paper Scissors vs a randomly generated computer choice. Testing with cypress

name: Greta's Greens
description: In a team of 4, Ruby on Rails was used to build a platform where an Owner can create a menu, so visiting guests may place an order. Authentication with Devise, feature tests with Cucumber and unit tests with Rspec.

name: Rails Article Application
description: Web applitcation where users can use to create accounts and share articles. Authentication with Devise, feature and unit test with Cucumber and Rspec.
